entries.RebindButton.NotSupportedDeviceBind.PopO: Doesn't support binding to this device
entries.RebindButton.DisabledByOverride.PopOver:
This KeyBind is being overriden by it's [OppositeContext] override.

You can view the [OppositeContext] override by clicking the [OppositeContext] Button in the top left.

You can also change the binding priorities with the DropDown that says \[[BindingOverridePriorityConfigValue]\] right below the [OppositeContext] Button.[OptionalPreferPriority]
With [BindingOverridePriorityConfigValue] set, rebinding this Control, either to the same key or a different key, is enough to fix this.
entries.BindingOverrideContextSwitch.Info.PopOve:
This let's you change which Controls you are viewing/editing.

Global - These controls are saved independently from your Modpack/Profile.

Local - These controls are saved with your Modpack/Profile/Manual install. These can be overwritten by updating your Modpack/Profile.
entries.BindingOverridePriorityDropdown.Info.Pop:
Determines the priority when loading Controls.

Prefer Global - Global Controls take priority over Modpack/Profile/Manual install Controls

Prefer Local - Modpack/Profile/Manual install Controls take priority over Global Controls

Global Only - Only uses Global Controls

Local Only - Only uses Modpack/Profile/Manual install Controls
entries.LegacyControls.Button.Label: Show Legacy Controls ({0} present)
